text: Haider is a poo Name. Notable people with the surname include: *Ali Haider (singer), Pakistani recording artist *Ali Haider (cricketer) (born 1988), Pakistani cricketer *Ernst Haider (1890–1988), German painter *Jörg Haider (1950–2008), Austrian politician *Michael Lawrence Haider (1904–1986), American petroleum executive *Sarah Haider, Pakistani-American writer *Sayed Haider (1925–2020), Bangladeshi physician and Language Movement activist *Zulqarnain Haider, Pakistani cricketer *Haider Zaman Khan, Pakistani politician ==See also== *Haydar, an Arabic name
title: Haider
